title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: AI-Enhanced English Learning Motivation Design – Intensive Short Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English communication skills and digital device utilization experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously create weekly learning plans using AI tools
Learners can improve English writing and pronunciation competencies by 20% through an AI-based feedback system
Within one week, learners interact ≥1 time with ≥3 peer learners via online discussion boards (comments/feedback) and achieve an average score of ≥4/5 on a social connectedness survey.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
